parameters.name: g10_longitude

parameters.description: Magnetic local time at satellite position

parameters.name: g10_perp
parameters.description: Unit vector in GEI perp to orbital plane (parallel to Earth's spin axis for 0 inclination orbit)

parameters.name: g10_b_enp
parameters.description: Magnetic field in LH-ENP (P=northward Perp to orbital plane, E=Earthward perp to P and Earth center, N=eastward/LH Normal to P and E)

parameters.name: ORIENTATION_FLAG
parameters.description: EPEAD orientation flag. 0: A/W faces East and B/E faces West. 1: A/W faces West and B/E faces East. 2: yaw-flip in progress.

parameters.name: E1W_DTC_FLUX
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Electron integral flux E1 >0.8 MeV (dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E2W_DTC_FLUX
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Electron integral flux E2 >2 MeV (dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E1W_COR_FLUX
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Electron integral flux E1 >0.8 MeV (background, contamination and dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E2W_COR_FLUX
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Electron integral flux E2 >2 MeV (background, contamination and dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E1W_COR_ERR
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Standard deviation, electron integral flux E1 >0.8 MeV (background, contamination and dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E2W_COR_ERR
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Standard deviation, electron integral flux E2 >2 MeV (background, contamination and dead time corrected)

parameters.name: E1W_DQF
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Data quality flag pertaining to solar proton contamination for fluxes with energy E1 >.8 MeV (0 if contamination is sufficiently small that the correction and electron fluxes are valid; 1 if contamination is too large and the electron fluxes are not valid.)

parameters.name: E2W_DQF
parameters.description: A/W Detector: Data quality flag pertaining to solar proton contamination for fluxes with energy E2 >2 MeV

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack9
parameters.description: Average Electron Flux in Telescope 9 (oriented 70+Y, pointing North or South depending on yaw state) for 5 energy bands 40-475 keV (as time-series plots; corrected for dead-time errors and other contamination sources)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack6
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 6 (oriented 35+Y, pointing N or S)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack3
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 3 (oriented 70-X, pointing equatorial E or W)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack4
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 4 (oriented 35-X, pointing equatorial E or W)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack2
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 2 (oriented 35+X, pointing equatorial W or E)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack5
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 5 (oriented 70+X, pointing equatorial W or E)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack8
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 8 (oriented 35-Y, pointing S or N)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_stack7
parameters.description: ---> Electron Flux in Telescope 7 (oriented 70-Y, pointing S or N)

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux
parameters.description: ---> Spectrogram of Electron Flux by energy for each telescope

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_t_stack1
parameters.description: Average Electron Flux at 40 keV for 9 directions ordered north to south (101 to 109) or south to north depending on yaw state in time-series plots; corrected for dead-time errors and other contamination sources

parameters.name: dtc_uncor_eflux
parameters.description: Electron Fluxes uncorrected for contamination (as flux by energy spectrograms for each telescope in orientation order; corrected for dead-time errors)

parameters.name: qual_flag
parameters.description: ---> [NO PLOTS] Quality flag (non-zero value indicates a telemetry processing issue)

parameters.name: west_longitude
parameters.description: West longitude of satellite sub-orbit point

parameters.name: inclination
parameters.description: Inclination -- the angle between the plane of the orbit and the equatorial plane measured counter-clockwise from true East

parameters.name: dtc_cor_eflux_t_stack1
parameters.description: Average Electron Flux at 40 keV for 9 directions ordered north to south (101 to 109) or south to north depending on yaw state in time-series plots; corrected for dead-time errors and other contamination sources

parameters.name: dtc_uncor_eflux
parameters.description: Electron Fluxes uncorrected for contamination (as flux by energy spectrograms for each telescope in orientation order; corrected for dead-time errors)

parameters.name: qual_flag
parameters.description: ---> [NO PLOTS] Quality flag (non-zero value indicates a telemetry processing issue)

parameters.name: west_longitude
parameters.description: West longitude of satellite sub-orbit point

parameters.name: inclination
parameters.description: Inclination -- the angle between the plane of the orbit and the equatorial plane measured counter-clockwise from true East
